publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4309 Jackie Baillie: Abseil for Enable—That the Parliament welcomes Enable Scotland’s fundraising event at the Titan Crane on the 1 August 2009; notes that brave fundraisers will abseil 150 feet down from the top of the famous Scottish landmark; further notes that the last abseil from the crane led to 50 participants raising over £10,000 for the charity, and calls on all budding thrill seekers to register for the event at the Enable website, www.enable.org.uk, for a day that is sure to raise lots of money as well as pulses.

S3M-4309 Jackie Baillie: Abseil for Enable—That the Parliament welcomes Enable Scotland’s fundraising event at the Titan Crane on the 1 August 2009; notes that brave fundraisers will abseil 150 feet down from the top of the famous Scottish landmark; further notes that the last abseil from the crane led to 50 participants raising over £10,000 for the charity, and calls on all budding thrill seekers to register for the event at the Enable website, www.enable.org.uk, for a day that is sure to raise lots of money as well as pulses. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Ross Finnie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jack McConnell*, Jamie McGrigor*, Elaine Murray*, Des McNulty*, Bill Kidd*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-4309 Abseil for Enable (lodged on 3 June 2009) James Kelly*, Robin Harper*, Mary Mulligan*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4309 Abseil for Enable (lodged on 3 June 2009) Cathie Craigie*, Trish Godman*
S3M-4309 Abseil for Enable (lodged on 3 June 2009) Gil Paterson*, Sandra White*
S3M-4309 Abseil for Enable (lodged on 3 June 2009) Tom McCabe*
S3M-4309 Abseil for Enable (lodged on 3 June 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*, Stuart McMillan*
